strapiPost.title: TheatreSquared Announces 2023-24 Season Schedule
strapiPost.content:
TheatreSquared has announced its 2023-2024 season, promising its most ambitious season yet with a stacked schedule of exciting performances.

  • Fall in love: The season will begin with the crime thriller Dial M For Murder, followed by Tony Award-winning musical The Band's Visit, and 2023 will conclude with the beloved classic A Christmas Carol during the holiday season, Nov 29-Dec 24.
  • Spring in your step: The first show of 2024 is Pulitzer Prize finalist What the Constitution Means to Me, followed by rock epic Cambodian Rock Band, mother-daughter comedy Laughs in Spanish, and the Shakespeare-inspired Fat Ham. The season will close with the World Premiere of Responders, a dark comedy by Arkansas native Joseph Scott Ford.

Season packages are on sale by phone at (479) 777-7477 or online HERE.
